sgw_utils.evaluation package¶

Submodules¶

sgw_utils.evaluation.scores module¶

sgw_utils.evaluation.scores.calculate_scores(cm, verbosity=True)[source]¶

Calculate precision, recall, and F-measure from confusion matrix.

Parameters:
  • cm – Confusion matrix of ground truth and predictions.
  • verbosity – Verbosity of showing status.
Returns:

Tuple of precision, recall, and F-measure as numpy arrays.
sgw_utils.evaluation.scores.display_scores(dirpath, verbosity=False)[source]¶

Display summarized scores.

Parameters:
  • dirpath – Directory containing score files named as ‘*_cm.npy’, ‘*_prec.npy’, ‘*_rec.npy’, and , ‘*_f_m.npy’.
  • verbosity – Verbosity of showing attributes of scores.
sgw_utils.evaluation.scores.score_saver(output_dir, y_pred, y_true, identifier='evaldata', skipcase=True, verbosity=True)[source]¶

Save scores of precision, recall, F-measure calculated by prediction results and ground truth.

Parameters:
  • output_dir –

    Directory for outputting scores:

    • <output_dir>/<identifier>_cm.npy: confusion matrix
    • <output_dir>/<identifier>_prec.npy: precision
    • <output_dir>/<identifier>_rec.npy: recall
    • <output_dir>/<identifier>_f_m.npy: F-measure
  • y_pred – Result of prediction.
  • y_true – Ground truth corresponding to the y_pred.
  • identifier – Identifier of output file name.
  • skipcase – Flag to skip the calculation and saving when the output scores are already existing.
Pamar verbosity:
 

Verbosity of showing status(except skipcase info).
